title: Sketchbook Folio, "Landscape with Dark Trees and Crescent Moon", 1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
dimensions:
9.2 x 15 cm (3 5/8 x 5 7/8 in.), irregular
Sheet: 12.5 x 19 cm (4 15/16 x 7 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Grass in foreground with a stand of dark trees across midground. Partially obscured crescent moon behind trees in sky at left center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Landscape with Dark Trees and Crescent Moon", 1902.
1902. Graphite on off-white wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-87-47.
